description:
After having completed the joint camp, Marginal #4 has developed yet again!
However, Tsubasa tells Rui, L, and R that Atom might be leaving the group.
With the looming danger for future of Marginal #4, all of them are torn between wanting to stop Atom and wanting to encourage him.
On top of that, R happens to see that Rui is secretly writing to a certain place as well.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 離別[わかれ]から絆[つなが]るプロミネンス
